flawed_nl_solution:
She takes .75 minutes to answer a question because 12 / 16 = <<12/16=0.075>>0.075
It will take her 60 minutes to take the entire exam because 80 x 0.075 = <<80*0.075=6.0>>6.0
She has 0 minutes left when she is done because 60 - 6.0 = <<60-6.0=54.0>>54.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.75, not 0.075. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
